title: AE脚本：文字图层样式属性编辑脚本 Aescripts pt_TextEdit 2.41 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 可简单快速的的修改文字图层的任何属性，文字预设的使用和自定义，还可以将文字属性应用到其他图层。Search for and edit text layers throughout your After Effects project. You can create your own text style presets and apply them to multiple layers at the click of a button.
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6
